titleStmt.title: These are to give notice to all that occasionally are concerned herein viz. Book-sellers, stationers, printers, mathematisians [sic], and drawers painters ... and all other persons that use woodden prints for what use soever ...
titleStmt.author: Willson, John fl. 1700.
